items.sentence: I disagree with almost everything Tom just said.
Tom wanted to hone his skills as a photographer.
There are no direct flights to Boston from here.
There are teeth marks on the end of that pencil.
Tom has long hair, which he wears in a ponytail.
Tom heard someone knock on the door three times.
Tom introduced himself to the rest of the class.
If Tom told you he liked you, what would you do?
There is a little time before the train departs.
Everything in the store is half price this week.
